lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Stephin Merrit
[00:14.550]I like your twisted point of view, Mike
[00:20.970]I like your questioning eyebrows
[00:27.340]You've made it pretty clear what you like
[00:34.020]It's only fair to tell you now
[00:40.380]that I leave early in the morning
[00:46.930]and I won't be back till next year
[00:53.470]I see that kiss-me pucker forming
[00:59.890]but maybe you should plug it with a beer, cause
[01:04.840]
[01:06.970]Papa was a rodeo - Mama was a rock'n'roll band
[01:12.910]I could play guitar and rope a steer before I learned to stand
[01:19.820]Home was anywhere with diesel gas - Love was a trucker's hand
[01:25.890]Never stuck around long enough for a one night stand
[01:33.300]
[01:33.710]Before you kiss me you should know
[01:39.470]Papa was a rodeo
[01:46.010]
[01:55.970]The light reflecting off the mirror ball
[02:02.240]looks like a thousand swirling eyes
[02:09.550]They make me think I shouldn't be here at all
[02:14.890]You know, every minute someone dies
[02:21.620]What are we doing in this dive bar
[02:28.400]How can you live in a place like this
[02:34.440]Why don't you just get into my car
[02:40.800]and I'll take you away I'll take that kiss now, but
[02:46.220]
[02:47.420]Papa was a rodeo Mama was a rock'n'roll band
[02:54.410]I could play guitar and rope a steer before I learned to stand
[03:01.390]Home was anywhere with diesel gas - Love was a trucker's hand
[03:07.630]Never stuck around long enough for a one night stand
[03:13.510]
[03:14.330]Before you kiss me you should know
[03:20.820]Papa was a rodeo
[03:29.160]
[03:38.140]And now it's 55 years later
[03:44.880]We've had the romance of the century
[03:51.030]After all these years wrestling gators
[03:57.290]I still feel like crying when I think of what you said to me
[04:02.990]
[04:03.960]Papa was a rodeo Mama was a rock'n'roll band
[04:09.880]I could play guitar and rope a steer before I learned to stand
[04:16.840]Home was anywhere with diesel gas - Love was a trucker's hand
[04:22.930]Never stuck around long enough for a one night stand
[04:29.880]
[04:30.670]Before you kiss me you should know
[04:36.590]Papa was a rodeo
[04:42.460]
[04:43.900]What a coincidence, your Papa was a rodeo too
tlyric:
[by:iaodao]
[00:14.550]我喜欢你捉摸不定的想法，麦克
[00:20.970]我喜欢你充满疑问的眉眼
[00:27.340]你对于你喜欢的东西都讲得很清楚
[00:34.020]只有现在告诉你才公平
[00:40.380]我今早要离去
[00:46.930]我到明年才回来
[00:53.470]我看到你索吻的嘴型
[00:59.890]但也许你可以往嘴里塞瓶啤酒，因为
[01:06.970]我爸爸是个牛仔，我妈妈有个摇滚乐队
[01:12.910]我还不会站的时候就已经会弹吉他了，会抛绳套牛了
[01:19.820]家可以是任何燃烧汽油开车到达的地方，爱就在司机手中
[01:25.890]永远不会逗留，一夜春宵已足够
[01:33.710]在你吻我之前，你应该知道
[01:39.470]我爸爸是个牛仔
[01:55.970]当光透过反射镜
[02:02.240]看上去像成千打转的眼睛
[02:09.550]它们让我觉得我根本不应该呆在这儿
[02:14.890]你知道的，每秒都有人永远离开
[02:21.620]就像我们在这个酒吧做的
[02:28.400]你怎么能呆在这样一个地方
[02:34.440]你为什么不进我车里
[02:40.800]我带你走，我也会接受那个吻，但是
[02:47.420]我爸爸是个牛仔，我妈妈有个摇滚乐队
[02:54.410]我还不会站的时候就已经会弹吉他了，会抛绳套牛了
[03:01.390]家可以是任何燃烧汽油开车到达的地方，爱就在司机手中
[03:07.630]永远不会逗留，一夜春宵已足够
[03:14.330]在你吻我之前，你应该知道
[03:20.820]我爸爸是个牛仔
[03:38.140]现在已经是55年之后了
[03:44.880]我们有了一个世纪的浪漫
[03:51.030]在这些年的起起伏伏之后
[03:57.290]当我想起你对我说的话我还是有想哭的感觉
[04:03.960]我爸爸是个牛仔，我妈妈有个摇滚乐队
[04:09.880]我还不会站的时候就已经会弹吉他了，会抛绳套牛了
[04:16.840]家可以是任何燃烧汽油开车到达的地方，爱就在司机手中
[04:22.930]永远不会逗留，一夜春宵已足够
[04:30.670]在你吻我之前，你应该知道
[04:36.590]我爸爸是个牛仔
[04:43.900]多巧啊，你爸爸也是牛仔啊
